00016 ///////////////////////////
00017 // Game State Management //
00018 ///////////////////////////
00019 bool CPlayGameVorticon::loadGameState()
00020 {
00021  // This fills the datablock from CSavedGame object
00022  if(m_SavedGame.load())
00023  {
00024   // Create the special merge effect (Fadeout)
00025   CColorMerge *pColorMergeFX = new CColorMerge(8);
00026 
00027   // Prepare for loading the new level map and the players.
00028   cleanup();
00029 
00030   // get the episode, level and difficulty
00031   char newLevel;
00032   m_SavedGame.decodeData(m_Episode);
00033   m_SavedGame.decodeData(newLevel);
00034 
00035   bool loadmusic = ( m_Level != newLevel || m_Level == 80 );
00036   m_Level = newLevel;
00037 
00038   m_SavedGame.decodeData(m_Difficulty);
00039 
00040   bool dark, checkpointset;
00041   int checkx, checky;
00042   m_SavedGame.decodeData(checkpointset);
00043   m_SavedGame.decodeData(checkx);
00044   m_SavedGame.decodeData(checky);
00045   m_SavedGame.decodeData(dark);
00046 
00047   // Load number of Players
00048   m_SavedGame.decodeData(m_NumPlayers);
00049 
00050   if(!m_Player.empty())
00051    m_Player.clear();
00052 
00053   m_Player.assign(m_NumPlayers, CPlayer(m_Episode, m_Level, m_Difficulty,
00054      mp_level_completed, mp_option, m_Object, m_Map) );
00055   for( size_t i=0 ; i < m_Player.size() ; i++ )
00056   {
00057    m_Player.at(i).m_index = i;
00058    m_Player.at(i).setDatatoZero();
00059   }
00060 
00061   CMapLoader Maploader(&m_Map, &m_Player);
00062   Maploader.mp_objvect = &m_Object;
00063   m_checkpointset = checkpointset;
00064   Maploader.m_checkpointset = m_checkpointset;
00065   if(!Maploader.load(m_Episode, m_Level, m_Gamepath, loadmusic, false))
00066    return false;
00067 
00068   m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->getScrollSurface());
00069 
00070   m_checkpoint_x = checkx;
00071   m_checkpoint_y = checky;
00072 
00073   m_level_command = START_LEVEL;
00074 
00075   std::vector<CPlayer> :: iterator player;
00076   for( player=m_Player.begin() ; player != m_Player.end() ; player++ ) {
00077    int x, y;
00078    player->setupforLevelPlay();
00079    m_SavedGame.decodeData(x);
00080    m_SavedGame.decodeData(y);
00081    player->moveToForce(x,y-(4<<STC));
00082    m_SavedGame.decodeData(player->blockedd);
00083    m_SavedGame.decodeData(player->blockedu);
00084    m_SavedGame.decodeData(player->blockedl);
00085    m_SavedGame.decodeData(player->blockedr);
00086    m_SavedGame.decodeData(player->inventory);
00087    player->pdie = 0;
00088   }
00089 
00090   // load the number of objects on screen
00091   Uint32 size;
00092   m_SavedGame.decodeData(size);
00093   for( Uint32 i=0 ; i<size  ; i++ ) {
00094    unsigned int x,y;
00095 
00096    if(i >= m_Object.size())
00097    {
00098     CObject *object = new CObject( &m_Map, 0, 0, OBJ_NONE);
00099     object->exists = false;
00100     m_Object.push_back(object);
00101    }
00102 
00103    CObject* object = m_Object.at(i);
00104 
00105    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->m_type);
00106    m_SavedGame.decodeData(x);
00107    m_SavedGame.decodeData(y);
00108    object->moveToForce(x,y);
00109    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->dead);
00110    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->onscreen);
00111    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->hasbeenonscreen);
00112    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->exists);
00113    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->blockedd);
00114    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->blockedu);
00115    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->blockedl);
00116    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->blockedr);
00117    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->HealthPoints);
00118    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->canbezapped);
00119    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->cansupportplayer);
00120    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->inhibitfall);
00121    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->honorPriority);
00122    m_SavedGame.decodeData(object->sprite);
00123    object->performCollisions();
00124 
00125    if(object->m_type == OBJ_DOOR or
00126     object->m_type == OBJ_RAY or
00127     object->m_type == OBJ_SNDWAVE or
00128     object->m_type == OBJ_FIREBALL or
00129     object->m_type == OBJ_ICECHUNK or
00130     object->m_type == OBJ_ICEBIT or
00131     object->m_type == OBJ_GOTPOINTS or
00132     object->m_type == OBJ_ANKHSHIELD) // Some objects are really not needed. So don't load them
00133     object->exists = false;
00134   }
00135 
00136   // TODO: An algorithm for comparing the number of players saved and we actually have need to be in sync
00137 
00138   // Load the map_data as it was left last
00139   m_SavedGame.decodeData(m_Map.m_width);
00140   m_SavedGame.decodeData(m_Map.m_height);
00141   m_SavedGame.readDataBlock( reinterpret_cast<byte*>(m_Map.getForegroundData()) );
00142 
00143   // Load completed levels
00144   m_SavedGame.readDataBlock( (byte*)(mp_level_completed));
00145 
00146   m_Player[0].setMapData(&m_Map);
00147   while(m_Player[0].scrollTriggers()); // Scroll to the right position on the map
00148 
00149   m_Map.drawAll();
00150 
00151   // Create the special merge effect (Fadeout)
00152   g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(pColorMergeFX);
00153 
00154 
00155   mp_ObjectAI = new CObjectAI(&m_Map, m_Object, m_Player, mp_option,
00156          m_NumPlayers, m_Episode, m_Level,
00157          m_Difficulty, m_Map.m_Dark);
00158   setupPlayers();
00159 
00160   m_Map.m_Dark = dark;
00161   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdark(m_Map.m_Dark);
00162 
00163   //Set surface alpha
00164   SDL_SetAlpha( g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, SDL_SRCALPHA, 225 );
00165 
00166   return true;
00167  }
00168 
00169  return false;
00170 }
00171 
00172 bool CPlayGameVorticon::saveGameState()
00173 {
00174  size_t i;
00175  size_t size;
00176 
00177  /// Save the Game in the CSavedGame object
00178  // store the episode, level and difficulty
00179  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Episode);
00180  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Level);
00181  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Difficulty);
00182 
00183  // Also the last checkpoint is stored. This is the level entered from map
00184  // in Commander Keen games
00185  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_checkpointset);
00186  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_checkpoint_x);
00187  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_checkpoint_y);
00188  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Map.m_Dark);
00189 
00190  // Save number of Players
00191  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_NumPlayers);
00192 
00193  // Now save the inventory of every player
00194  for( i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++ )
00195  {
00196   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].getXPosition());
00197   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].getYPosition());
00198   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].blockedd);
00199   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].blockedu);
00200   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].blockedl);
00201   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].blockedr);
00202   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Player[i].inventory);
00203  }
00204 
00205  size = m_Object.size();
00206  // save the number of objects on screen
00207  m_SavedGame.encodeData(size);
00208  for( i=0 ; i<size ; i++) {
00209   // save all the objects states
00210   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->m_type);
00211   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->getXPosition());
00212   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->getYPosition());
00213   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->dead);
00214   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->onscreen);
00215   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->hasbeenonscreen);
00216   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->exists);
00217   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->blockedd);
00218   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->blockedu);
00219   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->blockedl);
00220   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->blockedr);
00221   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->HealthPoints);
00222   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->canbezapped);
00223   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->cansupportplayer);
00224   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->inhibitfall);
00225   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->honorPriority);
00226   m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Object[i]->sprite);
00227  }
00228 
00229  // Save the map_data as it is left
00230  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Map.m_width);
00231  m_SavedGame.encodeData(m_Map.m_height);
00232  m_SavedGame.addData( reinterpret_cast<byte*>(m_Map.getForegroundData()), 2*m_Map.m_width*m_Map.m_height );
00233 
00234  // store completed levels
00235  m_SavedGame.addData( (byte*)(mp_level_completed), MAX_LEVELS_VORTICON );
00236 
00237  return m_SavedGame.save();
00238 }
